"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had en

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."

 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. It turned out there were two factions of beesThe bees had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of who

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."

You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea.

They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to The bees had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of who

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. THThe bees had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of who

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your fahad been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of who

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of who

You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you tIt turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of who

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of thIt turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of who

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enc, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of who

You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, AND FR

You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, AND FREE YOU FATHER FROM TH

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."

They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea.

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, AND FREE YOU

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When it landed on it, he told you t

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentray

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And sudd

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! No

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly rea

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

It was a long drawn out battl

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

It was a long drawn out battle, with great feats

"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

It was a long drawn out battle, with great feats. near losses

They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

It was a long drawn out battle, with great feats. near losses, last minu

You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

It was a long drawn out battle, with great feats. near losses, last minute triumph. And at

 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. And so they always failed to reach you.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.

 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

It was a long drawn out battle, with great feats. near losses, last minute triumph. And at the end, you stood triumphant in front of your father, who was still trapped by the queen's spell. You spoke the words to break the spell, and saw recogni

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

It was a long drawn out battle, with great feats. near losses, last minute triumph. And at the end, you stood triumphant in front of your father, who was still trapped by the queen's spell. You spoke the words to break the spell, and saw recognition and joy in his eyes. He

The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

It was a long drawn out battle, with great feats. near losses, last minute triumph. And at the end, you stood triumphant in front of your father, who was still trapped by the queen's spell. You spoke the words to break the spell, and saw recognition and joy in his eyes. hovered in fro

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

It was a long drawn out battle, with great feats. near losses, last minute triumph. And at the end, you stood triumphant in front of your father, who was still trapped by the queen's spell. You spoke the words to break the spell, and saw recognition and joy in his eyes. hovered in front of you, and wit

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."
 True your family was extremely overprotective, especially when it came to bees. But you knew the truth. They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea. 

He talked of how you were the true prince and his heir, but he had been ordered to leave you behind and he would never see you again. And how his true identity was King of Bees, but a witch had enchanted him and made him look like a human as punishment. But then he fell in love with a human girl. You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.

You were the result of this union, and the queen had taken her anger out on you. The queen, your "mother", who also took human form in order to punish the King for his unfaithfulness.

So you had been waiting, for years, to hear from the bees. And the bee that finally reached you told you the rest of the story. It turned out there were two factions of bees, one loyal to your father and one to the queen. The bees loyal to your father had been trying to get you to safety so that they could release your father from an enchantment, but every time they tried he would lose his memory of you and forget to watch out for you. And so they always failed to reach you.

But today was different. They had gotten word that the queen would be away and you would be alone.Today, they had finally stolen the queen's spell book.Today was the day you became the bee king, and free you father from the spell.
The bee on your shoulder told you to hold out your hand.
 When he landed on it he told you to concentrate on him, and what it would be like to be a bee. And suddenly you were! Now you were truly ready to take back the kingdom.

It was a long drawn out battle, with great feats. near losses, last minute triumph. And at the end, you stood triumphant in front of your father, who was still trapped by the queen's spell. You spoke the words to break the spell, and saw recognition and joy in his eyes. hovered in front of you, and with a cry proclaimed "All Hail the t

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Finally," you said "What took you so long?"
"This is the first time I've been able to get close enough."

They couldn't stand you and didn't want you around since your brother was more then happy to take over once he came of age. You're not even sure why they kept you around, though having found the secret diary left by your father you had an idea.
